A0: The government 's reason for holding qualifying exams
RelatedSentence: The government 's reason for holding qualifying exams is actually a result of its inability to extend the service to every Filipino ; thus , it prioritizes the ones with higher aptitudes .
It is entirely different from the objectives of private benefactors who act out of pure liberality or in consideration of a future service .
In fact , it 's the government that owes the scholars .

The dream of an intelligent and competent nation is a dream shared by each Filipino , and every Juan , the government and the scholar included , must work together to abduct that dream from slumber and make it a reality .
The government , as a creation of the people , follows the boss .
A Filipino can not be the boss when he / she demands what is unconscionable to the rest because he / she is not , in him / herself , the people .
Then , I reckon it is more fitting to call one a scholar of the people rather than a government scholar .
